entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:42 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
